heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, with a chance of snow showers west and south of I-89. Some clearing in the northeast. Lows in the single digits in the north, in the teens elsewhere. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday
text: A mix of sun and clouds north and east of I-89, more clouds and a chance for snow showers south and west. Highs in the low to mid 30s. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Chance of snow showers, highest chances south of Route 4. Lows from near 10 into the teens in the northeast, lows in the teens to near 20 elsewhere. Light and variable wind.
